newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates - Thinly offered higher on call.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates - Thinly offered higher on call.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted thinly higher on offers Tuesday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. No barges were traded versus none on Monday.
- Four barges, Mid-Mississippi River, one each week of May, bid 120 percent of tariff, no comparison, no offer.
- Nine barges, St Paul-Savage, upper Mississippi River, one each week of May and June, bid 145 percent, no comparison, no offer.
- Nine barges, mid-Mississippi River, one each week of June and July, bid 117-1/2 percent, no comparison, offer 125 percent.
- Nine barges, Illinois River, one each week of June and July, bid 105 percent, unchanged, offer 115 percent, up 2-1/2 percentage points from April 11.
